data.description: Studio projects in site-specific art making supplemented by readings and examples of relevant contemporary artists' work.

data.description: Introduction to techniques and basic sculpture concepts to provide a survey of sculpture studio practices.

data.description: Uses hands-on problem solving to develop an informed understanding of the creation of objects in three dimensions. Provides foundational skillsets for sculpture, ceramics, wood, glass, and metals.
data.title: 3D FOUNDATIONS
